channel.title: [1.4.7] [-==kingdom of despair==-] factions | mcmmo | more
channel.description:
[center][img]http://s14.postimage.org/i0kbonsv5/banner1.png[/img]
[b]IP: KINGDOMOFDESPAIR.COM[/b]
[u]Info[/u] This is a nice small community that will soon upgrade to a bigger one. If you're looking for a server to meet and play with new players, this is the one for you. You should also invite your friends. This is a factions server. Which means greifing and raiding is allowed. There's also a peaceful option, which cannot be reverted if done.
Website: KingdomofDespair.com
- Survival - Factions - mcMMO - ChestShop - CraftBay - and much more! - Updated often - No lag whatsoever - Nice community
Server owner: PolyMagic
We are looking to recruit staff members as well if you're interested, fill in the application below:
==================== In-game name? Age? Any experience? Why should I choose you? Anything else? Skype? ====================[/center]
